instructions: In a small bowl, stir together flour and baking soda.
Soften butter by microwaving for about one minute.
In a large bowl, cream together softened butter and sugar until smooth. Beat in egg and vanilla extract. Gradually blend in the dry ingredients from step 2.
Roll dough into balls about one inch in diameter. Flatten slightly to create round discs. Place onto cookie sheets.
Bake for 8 minutes. The cookies should be soft but able to be picked up in one piece without bending too much.
Cool for a few minutes, then enjoy!
To save cookies for later, seal in a bag so that they stay soft and don’t harden.
In a small bowl, stir together flour, matcha latte, and baking soda.
Soften butter by microwaving for about one minute.
In a large bowl, cream together softened butter and sugar until smooth. Beat in egg and honey. Gradually blend in the dry ingredients from step 2.
Roll dough into balls about one inch in diameter. Flatten slightly to create round discs. Place onto cookie sheets.
Bake for 8 minutes. The cookies should be soft but able to be picked up in one piece without bending too much.
Cool for a few minutes, then enjoy!
To save cookies for later, seal in a bag so that they stay soft and don’t harden.
